org.rdkit.knime.nodes.mcs

Class MCSUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rdkit.knime.nodes.mcs.MCSUtils

  • public final class MCSUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class offers MCS functionality based on the RDKit.
    Author:
    Manuel Schwarze

    • Method Detail

      • calculateMCS

        public static final DataCell[] calculateMCS(ROMol_Vect mols,
                                            double dThreshold,
                                            boolean bRingMatchesRingOnly,
                                            boolean bCompleteRingsOnly,
                                            boolean bMatchValencesOption,
                                            AtomComparison atomComparison,
                                            BondComparison bondComparison,
                                            int iTimeout,
                                            ExecutionContext exec)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculates the MCS of the passed in RDKit molecules.
        Parameters:
        mols - List of RDKit molecules. It is responsibility of the caller to clean those up to free memory.
        dThreshold - Fraction of molecules that the MCS must cover. Defaults to 1.0. 0.0 < threshold ≤ 1.0.
        bRingMatchesRingOnly - Ring matches ring only option. Default is false.
        bCompleteRingsOnly - Complete rings only option. Default is false.
        bMatchValencesOption - Match valences option. Default is false.
        atomComparison - Arom comparison mode. Must not be null.
        bondComparison - Bond comparison mode. Must not be null.
        iTimeout - Timeout for the calculation.
        exec - Optional execution context. Can be null. If set, it will be used to show progress and to let a user interrupt the calculation.
        Returns:
        Array of data cells with MCS results.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if MCS could not be calculated.
